name: redux

schema.title: Create Redux state
schema.description: Create a Redux state slice for a React project.

examples.description: Generate a Redux state slice with the exported symbol matching the file name. It results in the slice `fooSlice` at `mylib/src/lib/foo.slice.ts`
Generate a Redux state slice with the exported symbol different from the file name. It results in the slice `customSlice` at `mylib/src/lib/foo.slice.ts`
Generate a Redux state slice without providing the "slice" suffix and the file extension. It results in the slice `fooSlice` at `mylib/src/lib/foo.slice.ts`

path.description: The file path to the Redux state slice. Relative to the current working directory.
path.x-prompt: What is the Redux stateslice file path?

name.description: The Redux state slice symbol name. Defaults to the last segment of the file path.

appProject.description: The application project to add the slice to.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.
js.x-deprecated: Provide the full file path including the file extension in the `path` option. This option will be removed in Nx v21.

description: Create a Redux slice for a project.
